publ: by University of the West Indies
name: CaribbeanFunFacts
0:
”Alexa open island facts”
”Alexa tell island facts to tell me a fact”
”Alexa tell island facts to give me a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: island facts
des:
Ask for Caribbean Facts, and learn fun facts about the Caribbean.

Caribbean Fun Facts provides fun knowledge the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch island Facts" or "Alexa, open island Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
